entry.title: The need for larger blocks
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around the majority's right to dictate on the minority in a philosophical context. However, Bitcoin does not provide any 'rights' to individuals; they have the choice of participating or not. From a technical perspective, the majority can impose their will if they calculate that the reward for imposing a change is greater than the value lost. The conflict resolution could set a precedent for future disagreements, making it essential to consider the means of resolving it.
